seo.meta_title: About Playground Studios | Our Story & Approach
seo.meta_description: Founded on a simple idea: bring the wonder of play into professional creative work. Learn about our approach to photography and video production.

hero.headline: Where Imagination Meets Reality
hero.subheadline: We're Playground Studios. We create content that moves.

origin_story.headline: How It Started
body: The idea for Playground Studios was born on a simple walk through a Portland neighborhood.
I looked over and saw a bunch of kids on a break, playing at the playground. Unbothered. Carefree. Lost in their own worlds of imagination. And I thought—when did we stop doing that?

Somewhere along the way, we forget how to play. We get caught up in the 'right way' to do things, the safe way, the expected way. But the best creative work? It happens when you give yourself permission to play again.

That's what Playground Studios is about. We approach every project with the wonder of a child and the expertise of seasoned professionals. We play, we experiment, we push—and then we deliver work that actually moves people.
origin_story.layout_note: Can pair with image of Portland playground or Barrett working

process_philosophy.headline: How We Work
process_philosophy.intro: Every project follows the same philosophy—whether it's a single product photo or a full campaign.

steps.name: Play on Set
steps.description: We start with exploration. Big ideas, wild concepts, creative risks. This is where the magic happens—before we pick up a camera, we pick up the 'why.'

steps.name: Get in the Box
steps.description: Then we focus. All that creative energy gets channeled into precise, purposeful execution. Every shot has intention. Every edit serves the story.

steps.name: Go Home
steps.description: And then we deliver. On time, on budget, and exceeding expectations. Work you're proud to share. Work that actually performs.

process_philosophy.layout_note: Three steps could be visualized as a horizontal process flow

founder_bio.purpose: Put a face to the brand
founder_bio.headline: Meet Barrett
founder_bio.body: I'm Barrett Shutt—founder, creative director, and the person behind most of what happens here at Playground Studios. I've spent years working with brands like Celsius, Samsung, Kendra Scott, and MVMT, but the work I'm most proud of is the work where we genuinely solved a problem.
founder_bio.philosophy: I believe in honest work. No bullying. No bullshit. Just clear communication, creative collaboration, and content that does what it's supposed to do. If that sounds like what you're looking for, I'd love to chat.

header.headline: Full-Service Creative Production
header.subheadline: From the first concept to final delivery, we handle it all. Photography, video, post-production—whatever your project needs.

categories.name: Creative Development
categories.description: Every great project starts with a great idea. We work with you to develop concepts, build mood boards, and craft the story before we ever pick up a camera.

categories.name: Production
categories.description: This is where ideas become reality. Whether it's a full commercial shoot, lifestyle photography, or product shots in our studio—we bring the vision to life.

categories.name: Post-Production
categories.description: The polish that takes good to great. Color grading, editing, retouching, sound design—every detail matters.

how_we_work.headline: What Working With Us Looks Like
how_we_work.body: We keep it simple. Here's the typical flow:

steps.description: We start with a conversation. What are you trying to achieve? What's the story? What does success look like?
We develop the concept, build the timeline, and align on scope. No surprises, no hidden fees.
We bring it to life. Whether it's a one-day shoot or a multi-week campaign, we handle the details.
Polished, on-brand assets delivered on time. Ready to deploy.

budget_guidance.headline: Investment
budget_guidance.body: Projects typically start in the $5,000-$8,000 range for focused shoots, with most campaigns landing in the $8,000-$15,000 range. Larger productions scale from there. We work within budgets—let's talk about what you're working with and what makes sense.
budget_guidance.note: Subtle qualification without scaring away inquiries
